content.rendered:
Answering Shias and refuting Shias has been a continuous project of ours before the existence of the twelvershia.net website. The need for a website was obvious from the start, but the dire need for one became only so much more apparent when various other bloggers who owned Shia refuting sites started to go down. Reasons of why this happens differ from person to person, but it ultimately seems to be due to a lack of zeal.

Unlike those other websites, Allah-willing, twelvershia.net is here to stay! We will continue to provide clear, concise, and strong material to those that need it, whether they be Sunnis looking for what supports their beliefs, or Shias on a quest of truth. We will continue answering Shia allegations because that is what we do best.

The website has been consistently growing over the past two years and currently has a forum that even includes an ex-Shia section. Currently, the site is the most popular polemical site for content in field of answering Shias. Though, we will not stop here. We will continue refuting Shias until they are out of arguments, while simultaneously criticizing their ideologies. 

May Allah strengthen the faith of our Sunni visitors and guide the hearts of our Shia visitors.
